name: finsight-backend-DEPRECATED
description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED - This backend is no longer used. See /api/*.js for Vercel serverless functions.

scripts.start: echo '⚠️ DEPRECATED: Use vercel dev instead' && exit 1
scripts.dev: echo '⚠️ DEPRECATED: Use vercel dev instead' && exit 1

_comment: The backend functionality has been moved to Vercel Serverless Functions.
Auth0 has been replaced by Supabase Auth.
MongoDB has been replaced by Supabase PostgreSQL.
For local development, use: vercel dev
